Articles.Content:
I was reminded that it is possible to pick the Astronaut career path in Sims 3.

Who here gained the orange space suit ?

Sims3 "Future" expansion pack comes out Oct 23/24.

Edited October 22, 2013 by Lohan2008

I've done it before, not really much to it.

Try visiting Modthesims some time, its got a nice collection of mods for S2 and S3.
Once i did i thought it was a. Bit boring i thought you could go on a space station and go on EVA

Never realy liked SIMS but the building creator is fun as hell...

they should make a SIMcity where you make the buildings too,that is if EA doesent stop naging Maxis to death

PS. i realy want a spore 2

PS. i realy want a spore 2

no, no you don't.

Will left Maxis, so it would suck beyond belief.
A month ago I created Kirrim kerman- turned the pitch so he sounded like a kerbal- I took a break from it however.

Used to play a ton of Sims 3, but I got bored of it after the World Adventures Expansion Pack.

As for the Sims 2, I had all of the expansion packs for that - played a few hundred hours on it. Best one.
I love the Sims, but EA can f*** themselves with a fire poker. I will not give those bastards another cent.
